overview: After a 2-year absence, Buck Saxon returns home to find his girl, Norma, married to the town's wealthiest citizen, Ezra Bagley, yet professing to love Buck. Unjustly accused of attempting to murder Bagley, he escapes and joins a circus, where he falls in love with Bird, a tightrope walker.
tagline: Every Thrill of the Circus and the West Jammed into One Motion Picture. More Thrills Than a Three ring Circus.
title: The Circus Cowboy
